text: geunyeoege gung-gwol-e deul-eogala malhani gungjeon-eul bon geunyeoga geugeos-eul yeonmos-ila saeng-gaghayeo geunyeoui chimaleulgeod-eo ollimae sollomon-i igeos-eun yu lilo pyeongtanhage mandeun gungjeon-ila mal hani geunyeoga malhagil juyeo sillo jega joeleul jieossnaida jeoneun sollomon gwa deobul-eo man-yuui ju-isin hananim kke gwiuihanaida
